channel.title: @nicoespeon's blog
channel.description: Freelance web-developer and Agile coach thoughts. Lean, Kanban, scalable CSS, HTML5 games, Backbone.js, Software Craftmanship.

item.title: Kanban and Game Development with Trello

item.title: Plop — a micro-generator to ease your daily life
